books.author: by Harlan Coben
books.description: A retired Army helicopter pilot faces combat-related nightmares and mysteries concerning the deaths of her husband and sister.
books.name: FOOL ME ONCE

books.author: by Julia Quinn
books.description: Billie finds that, despite herself, she's drifting toward the arrogant George.
books.name: BECAUSE OF MISS BRIDGERTON

books.author: by Jojo Moyes
books.description: A woman who has barely been beyond her English village finds herself while caring for a wealthy, embittered quadriplegic.
books.name: ME BEFORE YOU

books.author: by Cynthia D'Aprix Sweeney
books.description: Siblings in a dysfunctional New York family must grapple with a reduced inheritance.
books.name: THE NEST

books.author: by Jacqueline Winspear
books.description: In 1938, the psychologist Maisie Dobbs travels to Germany to impersonate the daughter of a prisoner.
books.name: JOURNEY TO MUNICH

books.author: by James Patterson and Mark Sullivan
books.description: Jack Morgan, the head of the Private global investigative agency, probes the murders of members of the French cultural elite.
books.name: PRIVATE PARIS

books.author: by Lee Child
books.description: Jack Reacher pries open a missing-persons case that takes him across the country and into the shadowy reaches of the Internet.
books.name: MAKE ME

books.author: by John Grisham
books.description: The defense attorney Sebastian Rudd develops a close working relationship with his bodyguard and sidekick, Partner. A standalone digital short-story prequel to "Rogue Lawyer."
books.name: PARTNERS

books.author: by Kristin Hannah
books.description: Two sisters are separated in World War II France: one in the countryside, the other in Paris.
books.name: THE NIGHTINGALE

books.author: by Linda Lael Miller
books.description: A troubled teenager helps bring together his harried guardian and a filmmaker who has returned to the family ranch.
books.name: ONCE A RANCHER

books.author: by Jill Shalvis
books.description: After a disastrous mission, a soldier heads to a lakeside cabin where a wayward woman has docked her boat.
books.name: NOBODY BUT YOU

books.author: by Lisa Scottoline
books.description: A law professor caught in a prison riot must defend herself when she is unjustly accused of murder.
books.name: DADDY'S GIRL

books.author: by Tijan
books.description: Taylor sees the stress and struggle that give rise to Logan's rebellious behavior.
books.name: LOGAN KADE

books.author: by Karen Kingsbury
books.description: A baseball player intercedes when an ailing orphanage worker in Uganda needs a transplant.
books.name: A BRUSH OF WINGS

books.author: by David Baldacci
books.description: The government hit man Will Robie investigates murder charges against his estranged father in their Mississippi hometown.
books.name: THE GUILTY
